profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Sayville, Suffolk County, N.Y., September 27, 1984; graduated from Sayville High School, Sayville, N.Y., 2002; B.A., George Washington University, Washington, D.C., 2006; J.D., Hofstra University, Hempstead, N.Y., 2009; lawyer, private practice; business owner; member of the New York state assembly, 2013–2020; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021–present).
